com.prolificinteractive.materialcalendarview

Class MaterialCalendarView.LayoutParams

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.ViewGroup.LayoutParams
      • android.view.ViewGroup.MarginLayoutParams
        • com.prolificinteractive.materialcalendarview.MaterialCalendarView.LayoutParams
  • Enclosing class:
    MaterialCalendarView

    protected static class MaterialCalendarView.LayoutParams
extends ViewGroup.MarginLayoutParams
    Simple layout params for MaterialCalendarView. The only variation for layout is height.
